div.bibl: The Reform Advocate. Oct. 29, 1910. [EDWARD G. FELSENTHAL RUNS FOR SENATE OF ILLINOIS]

body.p: Edward G. Felsenthal is the Republican candidate for representative from the 3rd Senatorial District. He was born in Chicago 24 years ago and received his education at the University of Chicago Law School where he took a degree in batchelor of arts and doctor of jurisprudence. He is now associated with the law firm of Felsenthal, Foreman and Beckwith.
